item.title: Range drop arrows
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

okay so did this tutorial to make your arrows appear on the ground, but there’s something wrong with the second method the client can’t seem to find it here’s the code public void DropArrows() { int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4214 && playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] != 0) if (ItemHandler.itemAmount(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY) == 0) { ItemHandler.addItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY, 1, playerId, false); } else if (ItemHandler.itemAmount(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY) != 0) { int amount = ItemHandler.itemAmount(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY); ItemHandler.removeItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY, amount); ItemHandler.addItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY, amount + 1, playerId, false); } } public void DropArrowsNPC() { int EnemyX = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX; int EnemyY = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY; if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4214 && playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] != 0) if (ItemHandler.itemAmount(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY) == 0) { ItemHandler.addItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY, 1, playerId, false); } else if (ItemHandler.itemAmount(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY) != 0) { int amount = ItemHandler.itemAmount(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY); ItemHandler.removeItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY, amount); ItemHandler.addItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY, amount + 1, playerId, false); } }

i don’t get any errors with that part…

okay after that i go to my boolean attack() { and find everything that has drawback(); and under those add DropArrows();

i save compile and get no errors okay after that i go to boolean attacknpc() {
and find everything that has drawback(); and under those u add DropArrowsNpc(); okay then i compile and get these errors :

[code=actionscript]client.java:7556: cannot find symbol
symbol : method DropArrowsNpc()
location: class client
DropArrowsNpc();
^
client.java:7574: cannot find symbol
symbol : method DropArrowsNpc()
location: class client
DropArrowsNpc();
^
client.java:7590: cannot find symbol
symbol : method DropArrowsNpc()
location: class client
DropArrowsNpc();
^
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code]

EDIT: none of that code is mine by the way just thought I’d establish that…

Read full topic
